com.github.robtimus.junit.support.extension.testlogger.LogbackLoggerContext

  • Packages that use LogbackLoggerContext 
    Package Description
    com.github.robtimus.junit.support.extension.testlogger
    Provides interfaces and classes for the TestLogger extension.

    • Uses of LogbackLoggerContext in com.github.robtimus.junit.support.extension.testlogger

      Methods in com.github.robtimus.junit.support.extension.testlogger that return LogbackLoggerContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.addAppender​(Appender<ILoggingEvent> appender)
      Adds an appender to the logger.
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.removeAppender​(Appender<ILoggingEvent> appender)
      Removes an appender from the logger.
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.removeAppenders()
      Removes all appenders from the logger.
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.removeAppenders​(Predicate<? super Appender<ILoggingEvent>> filter)
      Removes all appenders from the logger that match a filter.
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.setAppender​(Appender<ILoggingEvent> appender)
      Sets the single appender for the logger.
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.setLevel​(Level level)
      Sets the new level for the logger.
      LogbackLoggerContext LogbackLoggerContext.useParentAppenders​(boolean useParentAppenders)
      Sets whether or not to use parent appenders for the logger.
